article: This is a special class in a Chinese school. The students come from  _  countries. Some come from America.  Others  come from Canada, Germany, Australia and England. They  _  different languages, but all of  _  can speak Chinese. They are good friends. They  _  together, play together and live together. They help each other. All of the  _  of this class are Chinese, but they can speak English, too. They help their students  _  Chinese. They are very kind  _  helpful. They work hard. All the students  _  this class study Chinese cooking, so they can make delicious meals. All the students say that they are  _  here. They also say China is a great country and the Chinese people are very friendly.
